text.section:
Sec. 2-266. Qualifications of members.
Members of the Commission shall be permanent residents of Miami-Dade County. Members, while serving, shall not become candidates for election to any public office. In order to secure representative membership upon the Commission, each of the eight (8) County Commissioners shall appoint three (3) members to the Commission and the Mayor shall appoint three (3) members to the Commission.
